subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Scott Dixon took advantage of Ryan Briscoe’s pit stop with 47 laps left, then held off Helio Castroneves down the stretch to win the Road Runner Turbo Indy 500 in Kansas City, Kan.
snippet: Scott Dixon took advantage of Ryan Briscoe’s pit stop with 47 laps left, then held off Helio Castroneves down the stretch to win the Road Runner Turbo Indy 500 in Kansas City, Kan.
